trans-unit.source: Allows you to access the run-time properties of active event logs and event log files.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您存取使用中事件記錄和事件記錄檔的執行階段屬性。

trans-unit.source: These properties include the number of events in the log, the size of the log, a value that determines whether the log is full, and the last time the log was written to or accessed.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性包含記錄檔中的事件數目、記錄檔大小、判斷記錄檔是否已滿的值，以及上次寫入或存取記錄檔的時間。

trans-unit.source: For example code using this class, see [How to: Configure and Read Event Log Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2d2b00b3-2d1d-4567-a47e-3f5a7c1955ac).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例程式碼使用這個類別，請參閱[How to： 設定及讀取事件記錄檔內容](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2d2b00b3-2d1d-4567-a47e-3f5a7c1955ac)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file attributes of the log file associated with the log.
trans-unit.target: 取得與記錄相關聯之記錄檔的檔案屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回整數值。

trans-unit.source: This value can be null.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time that the log file associated with the event log was created.
trans-unit.target: 取得與事件記錄相關聯之記錄檔的建立時間。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This value can be null.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the file, in bytes, associated with the event log.
trans-unit.target: 取得與事件記錄相關聯之檔案的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a long value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回長數值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that determines whether the log file has reached its maximum size (the log is full).
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，這個值可判斷記錄檔是已否達到大小上限 (記錄是否已滿)。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the log is full, and returns <see langword="false" /> if the log is not full.
trans-unit.target: 如果記錄已滿，則傳回 <see langword="true" />，如果記錄未滿，則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last time the log file associated with the event log was accessed.
trans-unit.target: 取得與事件記錄相關聯之記錄檔上一次的存取時間。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This value can be null.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last time data was written to the log file associated with the event log.
trans-unit.target: 取得與事件記錄相關聯之記錄檔上一次的寫入資料時間。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This value can be null.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of the oldest event record in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件記錄 (Log) 中最舊事件記錄 (Record) 的數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a long value that represents the number of the oldest event record in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 傳回長數值，表示事件記錄 (Log) 中最舊事件記錄 (Record) 的數目。

trans-unit.source: This value can be null.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of event records in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件記錄 (Log) 中事件記錄 (Record) 的數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a long value that represents the number of event records in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 傳回長數值，表示事件記錄 (Log) 中事件記錄 (Record) 的數目。

trans-unit.source: This value can be null.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 null。
